name: 范育成
objective: 此門課程的主要目標，將以介紹基本的數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有初步的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
schedule:
1. ISO 10918-1 JPEG
2. MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 Standard
3. MPEG-4 Visual Standard
4. Algorithms and VLSI Architectures for Motion Estimation
5. DCT/IDCT IP Core Design
6. VLC IP Core Design
7. Digital IP Design Methodology
8. Digital Watermarking
9. Digital Television
10. LCD Circuit Design
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考             40%
2. 期末上台報告       30%
3. 書面報告           30%
materials:
1. 上課講義
2. 教育部多媒體晶片設計教改計畫教材
3. Video codec design developing image and video compression
systems, by Iain E. G. Richardson, Wiley.
